about_the_game:
Unleash Your Inner Cyber-Warrior


Embark on a thrilling journey in Protocol Rift where you step into the shoes of A1V1, an ethical robot hacker determined to overthrow a tyrannical central AI. Experience high-stakes digital warfare as you navigate a fortified network, dodge relentless attacks, and solve complex puzzles to restore individuality and freedom.

Key Features:


Explore the Digital Highway: Traverse the network through the digital highway, uncover hidden secrets, and find the truth behind the central AI's reign.



Intense Bullet Hell Combat: Dodge bullets and unleash destruction in a chaotic, fast-paced bullet hell environment. Test your reflexes and precision as waves of drones attack from all directions.



Solve Complex Puzzles: Break the code with the power of your mind. Engage in challenging puzzles that require logical thinking and strategic planning to progress.



Epic Showdown with the Central AI: Defeat the central AI and restore individuality and independence to the digital world. Your final battle will determine the fate of all digital entities.

Why You’ll Love Protocol Rift:


  • Immersive Cyberpunk World: Dive into a richly detailed cyberpunk universe with stunning visuals and a gripping storyline.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience a seamless blend of action, strategy, and puzzle-solving, keeping you engaged and challenged at every turn.
  • Deep Narrative: Uncover the complex story of A1V1 and the central AI, exploring themes of individuality, freedom, and technological control.

Are you ready to hack the system and save the digital world? Join the fight in Protocol Rift and become the ultimate cyber-warrior!

name: Protocol Rift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Third-person action-adventure game that seamlessly blends intense bullet hell combat with thought-provoking puzzles. Dive into the high-stakes world of digital warfare as an ethical robot hacker. Your mission? To infiltrate a fortified network and overthrow the tyrannical central AI controlling it.
